Package com.uwgb.GBCoin.Model

Class Block

java.lang.Object
com.uwgb.GBCoin.Model.Block
All Implemented Interfaces:
HashHelper
Direct Known Subclasses:
GenesisBlock
public class Block extends Object implements HashHelper
A single Block class which contains the block number, hash of the block, hash of the previous block transaction list and the merkle root

  • Constructor Details

    • Block

      public Block(PublicKey publicKey, byte[] prevHash, long timeStamp, List<Transaction> transactions)
      Constructor to create a new block
      Parameters:
      publicKey - the public key of the miner who solved it
      prevHash - the hash of the previous block in the block chain
      timeStamp - the current timestamp of the block
      transactions - the valid transaction set to be included in this block
